descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kyrie Irving doesn't hesitate to drain a 3-pointer just outside of the logo.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kyrie shows off his range with deep 3-pointer) 2021/5/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kyrie shows off his range with deep 3-pointer

videos.description: The Nets put in their bid for highlight of the year with a seamless sequence of events that leads to a Kevin Durant slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nets end the half with one of the highlights of the year) 2021/5/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nets end the half with one of the highlights of the year

videos.description: Kevin Durant has no problem hitting a fadeaway jumper on former teammate Jarrett Allen.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD hits fadeaway over Jarrett Allen) 2021/5/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD hits fadeaway over Jarrett Allen

videos.description: James Harden casually enjoys a smoothie on the sidelines as he watches his teammates dominate the Cavaliers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden enjoys smoothie as Nets steamroll Cavs) 2021/5/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden enjoys smoothie as Nets steamroll Cavs

videos.description: Kyrie Irving becomes the 9th player in NBA history to join the elite milestone of the 50-40-90 club.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nets' bench celebrates Kyrie joining 50-40-90 club) 2021/5/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nets' bench celebrates Kyrie joining 50-40-90 club

videos.description: Kevin Durant dismisses the idea that the Nets have a big three and instead refers to the team as the 'Big 15.'
videos.headline: KD calls Nets the 'Big 15'
